trans-unit.source: Loads metadata about the conceptual model.
The **EdmItemCollection** loads metadata from conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files.
This class is derived from the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ItemCollection"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> class by using the collection of the XMLReader objects where the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files exist.
The collection of the XMLReader objects where the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files exist.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection"></xref> class by using the paths where the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files exist.
The paths where the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) files exist.
Gets the conceptual model version for this collection.
The conceptual model version for this collection.
Returns a collection of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> objects.
A ReadOnlyCollection object that represents a collection of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> objects.
Returns a collection of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> objects with the specified conceptual model version.
A ReadOnlyCollection object that represents a collection of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> objects.
